item.title: Aloft
item.description:
Title: Aloft
Genre: Adventure , Casual , Indie , Simulation , Early Access
Developer: Astrolabe Interactive Inc.
Publisher: Funcom
Franchise: Funcom
Release Date: Jan 15, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Jan 15, 2025




About This Game

Aloft is a feel-good, cozy survival game set in the clouds, where you can transform any island into a flying ship and explore the vast skies.

Navigate the world, discover new islands, gather resources, build your dream home, and take care of your animals, solo or as a group of up to 8 friends.

Yet within nature’s beauty, a corruption spreads. Root it out and cure the fungi threat that devours all other life. Uncover lost knowledge, brew powerful antidotes, enrich the biodiversity of the islands, and restore balance to the airborne ecosystem.

Aloft’s feel-good survival is more about rewarding positive action than punishing mistakes.

The sky provides everything you need; cook up delicious meals for buffs, gather resources to craft tools, and explore to find new technology. Soar the open sky freely and discover ancient ruins to uncover the secrets of the past.

Soar the open skies in a vast sandbox world and turn any island into your personal skyship.

Build and customize it into your personal home. With a helm, rudder, and sails constructed, you are ready to sail the winds and explore the skies. You are the captain of your adventure!

The wind is an ever-present ally in Aloft.

Install windmills and a network of cables and pulleys to automate your machines and production. Fly into strong winds to supercharge your crafting power and sailing speed, but make sure your sails can handle it.

Each island is its own living ecosystem, vulnerable to unsustainable gathering and the fungi corruption.

Find and cure islands from corruption by defeating the mushroom creatures in combat. Craft antidotes to save animals and restore islands to a state of harmony. By restoring their biodiversity, you gain access to new special resources, and make them more resistant to the corruption.

Collect seeds and animals on your travels and bring them to your home island.

Plant various crops in your garden to cook up delicious recipes, and care for the cuddliest of animals to gain rare resources. Form a true bond by meeting all their needs, and they will even protect you.

Creativity lies at the heart of Aloft, which can be enjoyed as a peaceful solo experience or with up to 7 other players.

Bring your entire island base when you join another player’s world, and create a small village of sky explorers. Use the in-game island creator to design anything you can imagine, then share it with the community to populate their worlds.


Craft the island of your dreams, challenge the corruption, restore balance, and express your creativity in the limitless skies of Aloft.

See you in the clouds!

item.title: WorldNeverland - Daily Life in the Elnea Kingdom - Another Life Adventure
item.description:
Title: WorldNeverland - Daily Life in the Elnea Kingdom - Another Life Adventure
Genre: Indie , RPG , Simulation
Developer: althi Inc.
Publisher: althi Inc.
Franchise: ワールドネバーランド
Release Date: Jan 14, 2025




About This Game

WorldNeverland - Elnea Kingdom

WorldNeverland - Elnea Kingdom is a sandbox life simulation game where you emigrate to a fictitious kingdom and have the freedom to live life as you see fit.

It's a living, breathing fantasy kingdom inside your computer!

Freely explore beautiful forests and rivers, as well as farms, pastures, mines, schools, churches, castles, and more.

Even the lives of the kingdom's inhabitants are simulated down the finest detail.

Visiting the kingdom will feel like an MMORPG as you engage in authentic conversations with its residents.

Find a partner, get married, and have children to pass on your lineage.

Life within this kingdom is completely unique, allowing you to weave a different tale with each and every playthrough.

This goes beyond that of a typical game, creating an experience that will stay in your heart as a cherished memory forever.

What Can You Do in This Game?

・Arrive in the kingdom as a traveler, become a citizen, and start a life here.

・Live in your own house and till your fields, save money and maybe even move into a mansion.

・Participate as the facilitator or guest of events such as seasonal functions and national ceremonies, as well as festivals, marriages, childbirths, funeral services, and more.

・Befriend and marry other single characters.

・Dedicate yourself to pursuits like a trade or martial arts and work your way to the top.

・Have many children to carry on your family line.

・Keep playing for generation after generation of your family by transferring control to your children.

・Use a variety of ingredients to make delicious food.

・Explore dungeons and forests, defeat monsters, as well as gather resources and ingredients for cooking food and crafting weapons.

・Compete to be the number one hero in the kingdom by entering martial arts tournaments.

・Live the way you want. Everything is up to you.

・Visit the library and read about the kingdom's vast history, spanning hundreds of years.

Elnea Kingdom Achievements

Elnea Kingdom is the newest installment in the beloved WorldNeverland franchise, with over 2.2 million downloads on smartphones and immense popularity on Nintendo Switch?. Now it's making its Steam debut with even more new and exciting features!

The smartphone version has received a high rating of 4.3 out of 5 stars. One notable feature is the exceptionally long average playtime, as players can have children within the game and continue playing as the next generation.

Steam Version Highlights (compared to smartphone and Switch versions)

Enhanced Graphics:

・Higher resolution character faces and outfits

・Double the variety of skin tone options

・Improved visuals in select locations

Improved Usability:

・Comprehensively revamped UI for enhanced ease of use and visibility

・Maximum number of save slots increased to 99

Additional Items:

・Several items previously available as DLC on the Switch version, including Magical Makeup, Tiaras, and the Speedy Anklet

・Steam-exclusive Skin Paint items, allowing you to customize your character's skin tone

・Access to all hairstyles without the need of the Hair Catalog

Fine-Tuned Adjustments:

・Slight game balance adjustments

・Optimized camera settings in certain areas

・Enhanced lighting effects on characters and environments

・Adjusted animation speeds for battles and dungeon exploration

*Please note that importing and password migration from the smartphone version are not supported. However, you can use password migration from the Switch version or other WorldNeverland series games.

The game now supports two official Steam controller configurations: Xbox 360 and PS3. Keyboard controls are also supported (mouse controls are not currently supported).

item.title: Heroes of Hammerwatch II
item.description:
Title: Heroes of Hammerwatch II
Genre: Action , Indie , RPG
Developer: Crackshell
Publisher: Crackshell
Franchise: Hammerwatch
Release Date: Jan 14, 2025




About This Game

Embark on a new adventure in Heroes of Hammerwatch 2.

A rogue-lite action-rpg brimming with randomly generated levels, deep customization, and rich persistent progression. Battle your way through the perilous Dark Citadel, collecting powerful equipment and trinkets that unlock game-changing upgrades and abilities. This unique mix of permanent equipment in the style of action-rpgs along with run defining rewards from its rogue-lite roots results in a compelling experience where you are sure to get something new out of every run, always progressing in some way, with no two runs the same.

Return from your expeditions to upgrade your town, enchant gear, and unlock new upgrades for your character. Build a thriving hub to support your adventures and shape your play style in countless ways.

And when you've conquered the Citadel, the challenge isn't over — New Game+ offers endless progression, tougher enemies, and ever more powerful rewards to keep the adventure alive.

Key Features:

  • 7 Unique Classes: Start as a Warrior, Paladin, Ranger, or Wizard, and unlock the Rogue, Warlock, and Sorcerer through gameplay.

  • Each class offers 3 specializations, introducing new abilities and passives.

  • Endless Replayability: Explore 8 distinct, randomly generated floor types, each teeming with unique enemies, traps, and challenges.

  • Town Building: Upgrade your town to unlock run-enhancing NPCs, stash items, and customize your adventure.

  • Dynamic Gear System: Equip enchantable weapons and gear to craft and upgrade your perfect build and explore varied play styles.

  • An Abundance of Unlocks: Find blueprints that unlock new enchants for your equipment, attunements for permanently upgrading trinkets you find, and drinks to modify runs.

  • Infinite Progression: New Game+ ensures endless gameplay with increasing difficulty, better gear, greater buffs, and unlimited leveling opportunities.

  • Team Up: Enjoy online multiplayer with up to 4 players—tackle the Dark Citadel together!

item.title: Hyper Light Breaker
item.description:
Title: Hyper Light Breaker
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , RPG , Early Access
Developer: Heart Machine
Publisher: Arc Games
Release Date: Jan 14, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Jan 14, 2025




About This Game

Enter the Overgrowth, a new realm in the world of Hyper Light. Play alone or with friends to explore open worlds, create new builds, rip through hordes and overcome the Crowns and the Abyss King.

Breaker is a brand new entry in the Hyper Light franchise, with a unique story fully realized in 3D for the first time.

  • A world in disarray, with mysteries to solve, vicious enemies to fight, and fully 3D environments to explore

  • A vast, ever-changing world awaits with large scale open biomes and deep labyrinths

  • Worlds are procedurally generated with unique layouts, enemies, loot and rewards leading to multiple playthroughs.

  • Traverse landscapes with incredible freedom with a variety of abilities; wall-dashing, hoverboard, glider and more

  • Battle through the Overgrowth alone or as a team in online co-operative play

  • Face hordes of enemies and brutal bosses in frenetic third-person combat

  • Rise to the increasing challenges stacking through every run

  • Discover and unlock a wide arsenal of weapons, items and upgrades to create the ideal build for new runs

  • Learn more about the Overgrowth from the fragmented memories of its mysterious defenders, the Crowns

  • Bring back resources to help the settlement flourish over the course of your journey

item.title: Pirates VR: Jolly Roger
item.description:
Title: Pirates VR: Jolly Roger
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie
Developer: Split Light Studio
Publisher: VRKiwi
Release Date: Jan 14, 2025




About This Game

Embark on a thrilling VR journey in Pirates VR: Jolly Roger

Where legends of lost treasure and cursed islands come to life! Stranded on a remote Caribbean island, you’ll uncover dark secrets, face off against undead pirates, and fight your way through treacherous landscapes all while guided by your trusty, but sarcastic, parrot companion.

Experience the vivid beauty and lurking dangers of the Caribbean

From lush, vibrant jungles filled with wildlife to dark, cursed caves teeming with undead pirates, every environment is richly detailed and stunning.

Journey across a stunning, open-world Caribbean island

Filled with loot and secrets waiting to be discovered, from overgrown jungles to eerie caves, every corner of the island offers new challenges. You'll climb towering cliffs, swim through underwater caverns, and navigate treacherous dungeons to pursue the fabled treasure of Davy Jones.

Prepare for fast-paced, visceral combat

As you face off against cursed pirates, undead skeletons, and fierce creatures, use magic lantern and classic pirate weapons like flintlock pistol and other weapons as you fight your way through hordes of dark, malicious enemies. Whether you're dueling ghostly pirates or running away from wild animals, every encounter will keep you on your toes.

Test your wit as you encounter a variety of intricate puzzles scattered across the island

From unlocking hidden passages to disarming ancient traps, you’ll need to think quickly and cleverly to uncover the secrets buried deep within the island. Every puzzle solved brings you one step closer to the treasure—and the dark truth behind it.


Pirates VR: Jolly Roger delivers an incredibly immersive experience

With dynamic, realistic VR mechanics, climb rocky cliffs, rappel down ropes, swim through sunken grottos, and navigate tight cave systems, all in beautifully rendered VR. Feel the rush of the wind in your face and the splash of the sea as you explore this fully interactive pirate world.

You're not alone on this journey

Your hilarious parrot companion is always by your side, offering helpful advice, clues to solve puzzles, and cheeky commentary to lighten the mood. This clever bird is more than a comical companion. It’s your guide to surviving the island’s many dangers and unlocking its hidden treasures.

Are you ready to claim the treasure and survive the dangers of the cursed island? Download Pirates VR: Jolly Roger now and dive into the ultimate pirate adventure!
